multiple-choice.question: A bitstring $b_1b_2 \dots b_n$ is called a palindrome if $b_1b_2 \dots b_n = b_nb_{n-1} \dots b_1$, i.e., reading the string from left to right gives the same result as reading it from right to left. Let $n \geq 3$ be an odd integer. How many palindromes of length $n$ are there?
